properties.Name: Dobulu
properties.description: Dobulu is named after the rolling hills near the town. Our team conducted walking tours with the local geography teacher and school children. Scroll the photo below back and forth to see the edits made to the online map on OpenStreetMap.org during our fieldwork.

properties.Name: Salkyn-Tor State Park
properties.description: Salkyn Tor is a park with a dedicated area for picnicking and a nature reserve over 4000 hectares in size. Park rangers record wild animal sightings and enter them onto an open, online database (www.wildlife.caiag.kg).
properties.caption: Overlooking the valley from Salkyn Tor Park while collecting GPS points and monitoring wildlife.

properties.Name: Naryn National State Reserve
properties.description: Naryn Reserve is a heavily protected reserve that is home to snow leopards and ibex. Rangers conduct regular monitoring missions and install trap cameras. We interviewed park staff to identify the pressures that the park faces, particularly with lands adjacent to its borders which are used by hunters and pasture users.
properties.caption: Ibex are a major tourism draw for trophy hunters and a key prey species for the iconic snow leopard.

properties.Name: Eki-Naryn
properties.description: Eki-Naryn is a town located near the merging of the Big Naryn and Small Naryn rivers. Clean water availability is very important for this community. We worked with the geography teacher and students to map the village and activities that affected the rivers. Scroll the photo below back and forth to see the edits made to the online map on OpenStreetMap.org during our fieldwork.

properties.Name: Naryn City
properties.description: Naryn City is the provincial capital and is home to a growing community of GIS users. In cooperation with professionals and stakeholders, we created an online atlas of traditional practices in Naryn made from user-contributions.
properties.caption: Working with undergraduate students from the University of Central Asia to digitize collected features from paper maps to Open Street Map, a Wikipedia-style platform for maps.
